ERP rates to go up come 1 August 2022ERP rates will rise by $1.00 at four different locations during eight specified time periods come 1 August 2022 as congestion returns.Here we go again!👉🏻 React with 🤔 if you wonder the effectiveness of ERP in managing road congestion!➡️Read ithere!
Sian alw go up haha by the time i drive erp will cost as much as one mchixken or filet o fish
actually erp is useful to reduce congestion at the period of time  and that strecth of road haha
but i tihnk before 7.30 am will be very jam  as they want to save money and wake up earlier

I do think that ERP was somewhat effective in the context of kpe and CTE during peak hours of the evening. Post pandemic  there's no ERP at kpe at those times and it has been very congested
Wonder how effective the next gen ERP will be which will be based on distance run on expressways
Doubt it'll discourage people as much as the fixed gantries in place right now
Because it isn't something you go past and can try to avoid  it just exists
Maybe it should give you a loud BEEP for each km travelled to remind you how much you have spent. I think everyone will be afraid to even turn on their cars after that.
